statements: SELECT * FROM secure_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM secure_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT borrower_id, lender_id, amount FROM secure_transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM secure_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id FROM secure_transactions WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM secure_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY lender_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, lender_id, borrower_id FROM secure_transactions WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM secure_transactions WHERE lender_id = borrower_id ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM secure_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY borrower_id ASC;
SELECT lender_id, borrower_id, encrypted_channel FROM secure_transactions WHERE encrypted_channel IN ('encrypted', 'secure') AND amount >= 2000 ORDER BY lender_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lenders;
SELECT lender_id, lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders ORDER BY lender_name DESC;
SELECT lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders WHERE lender_id = 5;
SELECT lender_id, lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders WHERE lender_name LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT lender_name, COUNT(*) AS total_borrowers FROM borrowers GROUP BY lender_name HAVING total_borrowers > 3;
SELECT lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders
SELECT borrower_name, borrower_email FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_id DESC
SELECT lender_id, lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders WHERE lender_id > 5 ORDER BY lender_name ASC
SELECT * FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders WHERE lender_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM lenders
SELECT lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders WHERE lender_id = 1
SELECT * FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name DESC
SELECT borrower_name, borrower_email FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 2
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM lenders WHERE lender_id = 1;
SELECT lender_name, lender_email FROM lenders WHERE lender_id = 2;
SELECT borrower_name, amount, transaction_date FROM borrowers b JOIN transactions t ON b.borrower_id = t.transaction_id WHERE b.borrower_id = 3;
SELECT lender_name, borrower_name, amount FROM lenders l JOIN transactions t ON l.lender_id = t.transaction_id JOIN borrowers b ON t.transaction_id = b.borrower_id;
SELECT lender_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY lender_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT lender_id, borrower_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT borrower_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY borrower_id
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id = '436ad32d-05f3-4805-8127-4f0dab446ae1';
SELECT borrower_name, encrypted_channel FROM Borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE lender_id = 'd4ffd576-05f3-4a7b-af00-5b0caa02f17c';
SELECT borrower_name, amount FROM Borrowers b JOIN Transactions t ON b.borrower_id = t.borrower_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM lenders;
SELECT lender_name, encrypted_address FROM lenders WHERE lender_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, encrypted_address FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT * FROM lenders WHERE lender_name = 'Alice';
SELECT lender_name, encrypted_address FROM lenders ORDER BY lender_id DESC;
SELECT lender_id, lender_name, encrypted_address FROM lenders WHERE lender_id > 10 ORDER BY lender_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, l.lender_name, b.borrower_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN lenders l ON t.lender_id = l.lender_id INNER JOIN borrowers b ON t.borrower_id = b.borrower_id;
